repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Oswego Central Trades & Labor Council Meeting Minutes
did.abstract: Bound volume of meeting minutes of the Oswego Central Trades and Labor Council

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one bound volume of meeting minutes of the Oswego Central Trades and Labor Council. The volume covers meetings from February 11, 1916 through January 9, 1924.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Oswego Central Trades & Labor Council Meeting Minutes #5521. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5911: TWUA Locals 1242, 3, 607, 129, Greater Northern Joint Board Minute Books
